title: Bug 27147[View Mgmt] No lazy creation of collapsed Fast Views?
description: Bug 27147[View Mgmt] No lazy creation of collapsed Fast Views? Not sure, but I thought that Views are now loaded lazily in the same way aseditors. I had a collapsed fast view (Ant View) and its contents was created onstartup.If this is intentional (since it is a "fast" view and should popup quickly)then pls close this bug again.
